body.raw:
## Overview

An online forum project for discussions. (Known 404 issue on first load â€” a refresh fixes it.)

## Technologies

- Next.js
- CSS
- JavaScript
- MongoDB (planned)

## Tasks

- Design a responsive forum UI
- Implement authentication
- Set up MongoDB for data storage
